name: Wandering Spirit
description: The Pokemon is a wandering ghost with a haunted expression on its face. It won't heed your call and might get lost floating aimlessly. Get to a medium to heal it.
effect: Whenever a foe makes Contact with this pokemon with an attack, swap their abilities. Some Abilities (Flower Gift, Illusion, Imposter, Stance Change, Wonder Guard etc.) can't be switched at Storyteller's discretion.
